Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the payroll tax of the metropolitan commuter transportation district
Summary: Excludes the counties of Orange and Rockland from the payroll tax of the metropolitan commuter transportation district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the metropolitan commuter transportation district and the payroll tax
